findings.title: Mint/Burn Events Not Emitted
findings.description: In the `Fund` contract, when tokens are being minted or burned, there are no respective events being emitted to reflect the dynamics.

findings.title: Reentrancy Vulnerability via Unprotected Function Calls
findings.description: The adherence of `checks-effects-interactions` principle is violated, which can lead to a reentrancy attack vector.

findings.title: Lack of Proper Sanity Checks for System/Function Parameters
findings.description: DeFi protocols typically have a number of system- wide parameters that can be dynamically configured on demand. The `Tranchess` protocol is no exception.
